channel.title: üè¢ Washington State University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Washington State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Adversarially Trained Weighted Actor-Critic for Safe Offline Reinforcement Learning
item.description: WSAC, a novel algorithm, robustly optimizes safe offline RL policies using adversarial training, guaranteeing improved performance over reference policies with limited data.

item.title: Conformal Prediction for Class-wise Coverage via Augmented Label Rank Calibration
item.description: RC3P, a novel algorithm, significantly reduces prediction set sizes in class-conditional conformal prediction while guaranteeing class-wise coverage, even on imbalanced datasets.

item.title: Incorporating Surrogate Gradient Norm to Improve Offline Optimization Techniques
item.description: IGNITE improves offline optimization by incorporating surrogate gradient norm to reduce model sharpness, boosting performance up to 9.6%
